lead_paragraph: Health officials said the people infected with the pathogen, which is spreading in Latin America and the Caribbean, had been abroad.

headline.print_headline: Mosquito-Spread Zika Virus Appears in 3 New York Patients
headline.main: Mosquito-Borne Zika Virus Found in 3 New York State Patients

snippet: Health officials said the people infected with the pathogen, which is spreading in Latin America and the Caribbean, had been abroad.
abstract: New York State officials disclose three residents have tested positive for mosquito-borne Zika virus; all three patients had traveled to foreign countries where virus is present.
